title: Leading U.S. video streaming services 2018 , by monthly average users
summary: The Leading U.S. Platform in the streaming services was Platform Hulu , who made 197.5 users .
The most U.S. Platform was dailymotion , with just 17.1 users .

In second place was Platform Netflix with 72.9 users ; third place went to Platform YouTube with 197.5 users ; fourth place went to Platform Spectrum_TV with 17.1 users and fifth place went to Platform Vimeo , who was 35.5 users .
gold: This statistic shows the most popular video streaming services in the United States as of July 2018 , ranked by monthly average users . The most popular video streaming service as of July 2018 was YouTube , with 197.5 million monthly active users . Hulu ranked third with 55.6 MAU .
